full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Details of the Tender

| **Tender ID** | WS4487377658 |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Title (English)** | General Contractor Services |
| **Tender Title (French)** | Services d'entrepreneur général |
| **Reference Number** | WS4487377658-Doc4487402776 |

#### Tender Documents
- **Solicitation Number** | WS4487377658
- **Publication Date** | May 01, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date** | May 23, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Amendment Date** | May 16, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date** | May 07, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date** | May 06, 2027

#### Tender Cancellation
The tender has been **cancelled**.

#### Tender Description
The purpose of this General Contractor Standing Offer is to undertake construction, alterations and urgent repair work, as and when required, at the following Correctional Service Canada Institutions:

- **Stony Mountain Institution**, Stony Mountain, MB
- **Osborne Community Correctional Centre**, Winnipeg, MB

This procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

#### Contact Information
To obtain more information, please contact:

- **Ben Wong**
- **Email:** ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** Not available at this time
- **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19569646?extsite=MTk1Njk2NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Targeted Solicitations
No targeted solicitations have been identified.

#### Notice Types
- **Procurement Category** | CNST
- **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price

---
